name: Corrupted Whipper Root
tooltip:
Corrupted Whipper Root

You have found a sickly, corrupted version of what appears to be a whipper root plant.  The visible roots of the plant appear tough and leathery, and a slimy film hangs from the plant.  It desperately needs some sort of attention if it is to be turned back to normal.

Requirements:
- Cenarion Plant Salve x 3
